title: The Shadow Unraveled
outcome: A citywide blackout uncovers a hidden mural beneath a collapsed metro wall: it depicts Marek Halden unraveling his shadow. The mural triggers citywide speculation about Halden's intentions, deepening rifts between Council factions. As citizens flock to see the mural, rumors grow, intensifying distrust of the BCI and fueling spontaneous acts of defiance. Directorate initiates crackdowns while Innovators demand full transparency. Harmonists are sidelined as citizens use the mural as a rallying symbol against algorithmic governance.

events.description: A blackout causes a section of the metro wall to collapse, revealing a mural of Halden unraveling his shadow. Residents flock to the site, taking photos and debating its meaning.
The mural goes viral across the city. Citizens project augmented reality messages onto the wall, calling for the end of BCI and greater freedom.
Directorate deploys patrols to disperse crowds at the mural, citing 'security concerns.' Clashes erupt as citizens resist attempts to erase the artwork.
The Council is divided: Directorate wants to suppress all mural references, while Innovators push for a review of Halden's archived decisions and internal documents.
Waves of citizens reenact the mural scene at civic monuments, using it as a symbol of defiance. Authority over the city slips further as algorithmic control continues to fail.
